attributes.action: Provide more help to unemployed people to become self-employed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Providing more help to people for example, providing information for that wish to freelance (Like information on the tax system, registering as self-employed).

The government could also help financially with things like benefit extensions regardless of hours worked (A person may be be working a 60 hour week at the start of their business but not actually earning any money), thus would need help to pay for items such as food and housing.

Other help may be access to free business advice from the government and possibly legal / finanicial advice for such people.
